root.name: beatmania IIDX 15 DJ TROOPERS
root.description: Beatmania IIDX 15 DJ TROOPERS, also known as DJT, is the 15th game to be release in KCET's long running Beatmania IIDX franchise.GameplayGameplay in DJ TROOPERS retains the same style as previous Beatmania IIDX titles, with the player using seven keys and a turntable to perform key presses in time with notes passing the target area. Whilst some minor additions have happened, such as an additional tutorial mode, the gameplay itself remains the same. StyleDJ TROOPERS has a strong military styling throughout the game. Beyond just the visual styling of the game interface, DJ TROOPERS also features military stylized videos and songs, such as BRAINSTORM. Also, the extra stage equivalent is known as MILITARY SPLASH, to add to the theme behind the game.
